description: In an exclusive interview with Meet the Press, Sen. Eric Schmitt (R-Mo.) says there should be “accountability” for Justice Department officials involved in Donald Trump’s investigations, as Pam Bondi is expected to be nominated as President-elect Trump’s attorney general.
title: Trump’s DOJ investigators ‘should be fired immediately,’ says GOP Sen. Schmitt

description: While opposed to some of President-elect Trump’s Cabinet picks, Sen.-elect Adam Schiff (D-Calif.) says he is “strongly inclined” to vote yes on Sen. Marco Rubio’s (R-Fla.) confirmation as secretary of state.
title: Marco Rubio is ‘unquestionably qualified’ to serve in Trump’s Cabinet, says Democrat Adam Schiff

description: The members of Notre-Dame Compagnons Choir came together to do more than sing — the crew helped rebuild Paris' fire-devastated cathedral.
title: Choir formed from the ashes of the Notre-Dame cathedral helps mark reopening

description: In 2013, Florida Attorney General Pam Bondi’s office faced a decision: whether to join investigations from other state attorneys general into Trump University, where students paid up to $35,000 for business classes that critics claimed were fraudulent.
title: AG pick Pam Bondi’s past vow: prosecute the ‘bad’ prosecutors who indicted Trump
